actions.committee: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Employer-Employee Relations.

official_title: To amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to reinstate an exemption with respect to the employment of individuals as State and local firefighters and law enforcement officers.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to exempt from its provisions certain bona fide hiring and retirement plans applicable to State and local fire fighters and law enforcement officers.

titles.title: To amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to reinstate an exemption with respect to the employment of individuals as State and local firefighters and law enforcement officers.
